metadata.title: CVE-2020-25286 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In wp-includes/comment-template.php in WordPress before 5.4.2, commentsfrom a post or page could sometimes be seen in the latest comments even ifthe post or page was not public.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
